prod_color_descrip: bright white on creamy jute grasscloth in color blanche
prod_descrip: Hand-screened grasscloth wallpaper printed in the USA with earth-friendly, water-based inks
prod_specs:
REPEAT: 50" MATCH: 3/8 DROP

HAND-PRINTED ON: JUTE GRASSCLOTH

27" WIDE

PACKED IN 8 YARD ROLLS

UNTRIMMED

ASTM-E84 CLASS A

EARTH-FRIENDLY WATER-BASED INKS

MADE IN THE USA
prod_t_1:
Sherwood -
This interwoven, undulating pattern was inspired by the curving sweeps of long stemmed French tulips in the glorious Sherwood Gardens in Kyra's hometown of Baltimore, Maryland. Let the tulips wind their way up your walls.

Learn more about the birth of this pattern!
prod_t_2: download PDF
prod_t_4: House & Garden Magazine The New York Times
prod_t_5:
Want to change the colors of this wallpaper? Or print on another ground option?

All twenty2 wallpapers can be easily customized. Learn more.
prod_t_6: Our grasscloth prints can be vacuumed to release any dust that may accumulate on the surface. Do not use water to clean the grasscloth wallcovering, as the vegetable dyes used to create the colors can bleed or streak.
prod_t_7:
INSTOCK ITEMS
Your order will ship within 1-2 business days if your item is in stock. The ship date may vary based upon availability of each item.

NOT IN STOCK ITEMS
The lead time for any product will be listed right above the price when you are viewing a specific product. If we are printing a wallpaper for you, you can choose RUSH IT during the check-out process to decrease the lead time.

MEMO SAMPLES
Memo sample orders are shipped via the US Postal Service unless otherwise specified during checkout.

RETURNS
As our products are made by hand and are manufactured and sold from specific dye lots, we cannot accept returns. We strongly suggest ordering memo samples to review the color and quality in person before ordering. Once you receive your order, please carefully inspect your product to ensure that it is in good condition and in the quantity you ordered.
prod_sm_title: Hand-printed wallpaper by twenty2 | Sherwood in palomino
